short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ProDevs AI offers seamless job applications across 30+ boards. Simplify applications and enhance job searches effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your job hunting experience with ProDevsAI, gain access to unlimited opportunities and tools that expands your job hunting journey.

Explore ProDevsAI, meticulously crafted to simplify your job application process across 30+ job boards effortlessly. Our advanced features not only streamline applications but also enhance your job search experience. We offer premium features for a seamless and effective job hunting journey.


AI Interview Preparation - Our AI-powered platform assesses your strengths and areas that need improvement, providing tailored interview questions and feedback.

Automated Job Search - Our Automated Job Search feature utilizes cutting-edge AI technology to craft tailored job descriptions that resonate with top talent.

Resume Analyzer -  Your CV is carefully assessed against job descriptions, with AI-driven recommendations for improvement.

Job Application Tool - Our extension supports platforms like BambooHR, Workable, Smartrecruiter, and more. Streamlining your job search is now just a click away.
